channel.title: Need help with youdied method
channel.description: making to if got wearing ring of life while dieing u wont lose stuff i dont want the teleport

item.title: Need help with youdied method
item.dc:creator: @Mario_PvP Mario PvP
item.description:
@Mario_PvP wrote:

i added something in deathstage method but if i die while wearing it the ring drops on the place where i died
i want it dissapears after i died

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with youdied method
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Edit this piece of code in client.java

if(AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[AttackingOn2.playerRing] == 2570 && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0 && AttackingOn2.currentHealth < 6){ AttackingOn2.triggerTele(3088+misc.random(3), 3500+misc.random(3), 0); AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[AttackingOn2.playerRing] = -1; AttackingOn2.playerEquipmentN[AttackingOn2.playerRing] = 0; AttackingOn2.setEquipment(-1, 0,AttackingOn2.playerRing); }

Read full topic
